body.name: Nuwave Brio Air Fryer, XL 8-Qt Family Size, Powerful 1800W, Quick and Easy, UP to 400℉, Quiet, 95% Oil less, Mini Pizza Oven, Compact, Dishwasher Safe Parts, Varied Recipes, Linear T Technology
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 55 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 2 hrs 55 mins
features: MAKE ADJUSTMENTS ON-THE-FLY – Want hotter temperature or need to cook it longer? No problem. Simply adjust on-the-fly any time. Control time and temperature any time in the cooking process. Brio’s intuitive digital controls are easy to operate.

DIGITAL CONTROLS - Set cook temperatures from 50°F to 400°F adjustable in precise 5°F increments. Unlike the primitive methods that regulate temperature by turning the heater on and off, our heater never turns off while cooking.

HEALTHY FRIED FOOD - Brio uses super-heated air and an efficient air-flow design to cook crispy delicious fried foods without the guilt. Brio allows you to air fry all your favorites - even from frozen, without defrosting.
PERFECT SIZE – Whether cooking for one or a family, 8 Qt is the perfect companion. Air fry, broil, roast, grill, bake, reheat, and even dehydrate - all in one appliance right on your countertop.

LINEAR THERMAL (LINEAR T) TECHNOLOGY – Linear T executes the set temperature accurately throughout the entire cooking process by continuously monitoring temperature fluctuations and making constant power adjustments every second to maintain the set temperature to ensure perfect results.

PERFECT FOR DORMS AND RV’S – Brio is designed to work well when the power source is less than ideal. It performs flawlessly in RV’s, dorm rooms, cabins, and campsites. With its 3 wattage settings of 700, 1500 and 1800 watts, you can cook anywhere, anytime with limited power.
SAFETY BUILT-IN - When the air fry basket is pulled out (opened), cooking is paused for safety. Once the basket is pushed back in (closed), the cooking resumes automatically.

DESIGN & ENGINEERING –Every feature and function of Brio are created and rigorously tested by highly trained chefs and RD team. We obsessed over every detail in pursuit of best taste and performance. Brio is engineered to out-perform your expectations.

CHEF INSPIRED RECIPES – Get inspired and confidently create your own masterpieces. Whether you’re cooking an appetizer, breakfast, lunch, dinner, or dessert, we have the perfect chef-inspired recipe for you!

WHAT’S INCLUDED - The 8 Qt Brio comes with non-stick air fry basket, ultra non-stick circulation riser for frying and grilling, and reversible cooking rack for multi-layer cooking, recipe book, Cooking Club app, and 1-year manufacture’s limited warranty.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, good quality!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a Christmas present for my daughter she was extremely pleased. Easy to use and quick cleanup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I just love this air fryer it us si easy to use and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this item...the size is perfect for me 😍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The fryer was so simple to use and the flavor of my sweet potato fries were awesome
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact the fries were crisp and very tasty. I bakes or what the call it fries with no messy oil. Quickly cooked. There was no real clean up. After it cooled I used a paper towel to wipe off any crumbs. That was it. and that was nice. I totally recommend the fryer. And I got the add on piece so I can cook multiple things at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for newbies.
reviews.reviewText: I like it…easy to use, just smaller than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars STOPPED WORKING— WONT HEAT AFTER ONLY A FEW USES. RETURN WAS A PAIN
reviews.reviewText: My air fryer stopped working and I used it less than 10 times. It had just passed the return window for Amazon but since it has a one-year warranty, I had to contact Nuwave directly and it took over 3 weeks - almost a full month - to get a new one! It’s been over 3 weeks and it’s “on the way” but still has not arrived. I recommend just ordering a new one from Amazon and send the faulty one back to them. I will not buy another one from this company if this happens again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really pleased with my purchase
reviews.reviewText: I did a lot of research before I made this purchase, not just with Amazon reviews, but others as well. I always start with the one star reviews. I always want to know what others did not like about it. Some noted the finish came off the fry draw very early on. I read a "blog" that said, "never use a fat spray product on the airfryer because it has chemical that might react harshly with the finish. I have never used a spray. I bought oil sprayer. I have never put it in the dishwasher. After it pre-heats, I place a piece of tinfoil in the bottom. When finished I remove the tinfoil and it cleans up with a few swishes of a dishcloth. It is so easy to clean. Initially, there was a bit of an odor from the product, but it never penetrated the food, and it disappeared after a few uses. I have made salmon, beef filets, beef shish kebobs and reheated fried chicken from the local fried chicken store (It tasted perfectly fresh). I have also cooked vegetables.. I am in my middle 80s and was tired of cooking meals. I might make a double amount of vegetables and reheat them a few nights later. Using the Airfryer is so much easier than cooking with regular pots and pans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooks food amazingly well!
reviews.reviewText: I have used this a few times and I am in love with how well it works every time! My first experience was cooking frozen chicken wings which turned out really well. Super crispy, moist and delicious. Right after that I made some fries which also turned out very well, just be sure to shake the basket half way through cooking so that everything gets crispy.Highly recommend this unit, I am excited to us the baking pan next!
